1383420.name: Aim Lab Signature Series - Bugha Pack
1383420.description:
Train like Bugha. Play like Bugha. Win like Bugha.

The Bugha Pack includes:
  • Bugha character avatar
  • Bugha 9mm weapon skin

About Bugha
At the age of 16, Kyle "Bugha" Giersdorf became the first Fortnite World Champion beating more than 40M competitors in 2019. That same year, Bugha was crowned the PC Rookie Player of the Year and PC Player Of The Year at the Esports Awards. Bugha currently plays for the Sentinels and streams on Twitch.

About Aim Lab
  • Aim Lab learns and identifies your core strengths and weaknesses
  • Skills and tasks adapt to your play using AI to optimize your individual progression
  • See play-by-play results and targeted tips for improvement
  • Compare your FPS skills — agnostic to game title — to other players and the pros
  • Rank and compete on the Aim Lab leaderboards
  • Fully customize your training with creator tools for custom tasks

Aim Lab is still in early beta. Contribute to the project by posting on our Steam forums or by joining our Discord!
